#summary tradelink with redi

You must have redi installed.

Steps
 # install tradelink
 # start redi and login
 # start tradelink redi connector start->programs->tradelink->redi
 # Acryonym is your 4XXX
 # Account is 4 digit sub account (eg 1209 for bright)
 # enter login information and click login


Test
 # open quotopia and try to request a quote
 # if you have problems, click the unhappy face button in redi and submit a bug report
